title: Irelia is fun to play
body: but i can't pick her because she is behind even when she's ahead.

replies.body: You could always try being better at irelia and not picking into counters.

> [{quoted}](name=MagicFlyingLlama,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=atIkOyz3,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-06-09T00:37:00.355+0000)
>
> You could always try being better at irelia and not picking into counters.

Nahhhh, making a post on the boards to bitch about it is way easier.
